```{r}
d <- read.csv('rts.csv')
d$AgeSubjectNum <- as.numeric(d$AgeSubject)
d$RTlexdec.e = exp(d$RTlexdec)
l <- lm(RTlexdec.e ~ AgeSubject + WrittenFrequency + LengthInLetters + Familiarity, data=d)
by1var.seq(l, thin.val=.2)
```
